articles.description: An auction of Star Wars memorabilia left in a loft by Chewbacca actor Peter Mayhew has been cancelled with the lots returned to his widow after she pleaded for it to be stopped.
articles.content:
An auction of Star Wars memorabilia left in a loft by Chewbacca actor Peter Mayhew has been cancelled with the lots returned to his widow after she pleaded for it to be stopped.

articles.title: Emmerdale SPOILER: Depressed Paddy disappears from the village - Daily Mail
articles.description: Paddy Dingle will spark a huge police search as he plunges to a dangerous low and disappears from the village during next week's Emmerdale.
articles.content:
